official_title: A bill to provide early retirement benefits for atomic energy security guards and Energy Research and Development Administration couriers.

summary.text: Extends provisions of Federal law governing civil service retirement for Federal fire fighters and law enforcement officers to atomic energy security guards and Energy Research and Development Administration couriers.
